column4: "@kenklippenstein Catering to the #Ruling #Elite, the only people who matter in this society. Meanwhile, the #CEOs are killing ordinary people for profit. #EatTheRich #TaxTheRich"

"it hurts to see this. People are *struggling* & this economy's benefits are arranged to benefit a diminishing number of people while the masses try to survive. Our income inequality is worse than 1700s France when the revolution erupted #TaxTheRich #TaxBillionaires #TaxElonMusk https://t.co/7hbQEccBi0"
"@NickKnudsenUS #TaxTheRich the wealthy disparity is getting worse + middle class will be destroyed! Time to address the inequality + stealing of assets by the billionaires!"
"No more excuses for billionaires. 99% of the UK is struggling, yet they continue to demand more wealth. It's time to take action. #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires getting more money? While millions in the UK can‚Äôt afford basics like food and heating? The system is rigged and it‚Äôs time we change that. #EnoughIsEnough #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires don‚Äôt need more money‚Ä¶ they need to stop exploiting the rest of us. We‚Äôre working harder than ever while they collect tax breaks and yachts. #WealthInequality #TaxTheRich"
"Why do billionaires need more money when the rest of us are working longer hours, falling deeper into debt and struggling to put food on the table? Enough is enough. #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires get richer while millions of UK workers are falling into poverty. How much more do they need before we say enough? #StopTheGreed #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires don‚Äôt need more money‚Ä¶ they need to pay their fair share. The rest of us are struggling to survive and it‚Äôs time the ultra-wealthy stop hoarding wealth. #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires claim they need more money to help the economy grow‚Ä¶ but their only real contribution is inflating their own wealth in offshore accounts while the rest of us struggle. #TaxTheRich"

"The UK‚Äôs richest 1% hoard more wealth than the entire bottom 99%. Yet, we‚Äôre still told they need more. No more excuses for billionaires getting richer while the rest of us suffer. #WealthInequality #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires say they need more money to reinvest. But we‚Äôre still waiting for the reinvestment into communities, public services and the people who actually work. #TaxTheRich"
"Let‚Äôs be clear: no billionaire needs more money. What they need is a little accountability, while the rest of us try to survive on scraps. #TaxTheRich"

"They say billionaires need more money to ‚Äòcreate jobs,‚Äô but where are those jobs when 99% of us are struggling to pay rent after made redundant by replacing workers with autonomous machines? The truth is, they just want more power. #WealthInequality #TaxTheRich"
"Billionaires need more money? Really? The UK is in a cost of living crisis while the richest 1% continue to dodge taxes. How much more do they need to steal? #TaxTheRich"
"The UK's richest 1% own more wealth than 99% of us combined. But sure, let‚Äôs give them even more, while NHS workers rely on food banks. Makes perfect sense, right? #TaxTheRich"
"Why should billionaires get richer when 99% of the UK can barely make ends meet? It's time to ask: what exactly are they contributing that the rest of us aren't? #TaxTheRich"

"They want us fighting among ourselves,  workers vs. disabled people  while they dodge billions in taxes. Let‚Äôs turn our focus to the 165 billionaires robbing us blind. #UniteAgainstGreed #TaxTheRich"

"Divide and conquer only works if we let it. Workers and disabled people pay their taxes. Billionaires don‚Äôt. The 165 at the top are the real problem. #UniteForJustice #TaxTheRich"

"Disabled people surviving on PIP aren‚Äôt 'hoarding wealth.' Billionaires with offshore accounts are. Let‚Äôs stop the lies and focus on the real problem. #StopTheScapegoating #TaxTheRich"

"The UK isn‚Äôt broke because of 16.1 disabled people on benefits. It‚Äôs broke because 165 billionaires won‚Äôt pay their taxes. Let‚Äôs fix the narrative. #TaxTheRich"
"Pitting 33.31 million workers against 16.1 million disabled people is a billionaire tactic to avoid accountability. We‚Äôre not the enemy. They are. #TaxJusticeNow #TaxTheRich"
"Let‚Äôs get this straight: It‚Äôs not disabled people or workers hoarding the wealth. It‚Äôs 165 billionaires avoiding taxes while we pick up the bill. #EnoughIsEnough #TaxTheRich"
"How do 165 billionaires fool a nation? By blaming 16.1 million disabled people and 33.31 million workers for the mess they created. Don‚Äôt fall for it. #TaxTheRich"

"Billionaires pointing fingers at disabled people on benefits is the height of hypocrisy. They‚Äôre the ones dodging billions in taxes while workers and disabled people keep the UK afloat. #TaxJustice #TaxTheRich"

"Billionaires dodging taxes love to pit workers against disabled people.  Here‚Äôs the truth: We‚Äôre all taxpayers. They‚Äôre the ones draining public funds, not us. #TaxTheRich"

"165 billionaires hoard wealth in tax havens, but they want you to believe 16.1 million disabled people and 33.31 million workers are the problem.  Spoiler: We‚Äôre the taxpayers. They‚Äôre the dodgers. #TaxTheRich"
